🔧 Daily Maintenance

Burner Inspection
  • • Check for proper flame color (blue with yellow tips)
  • • Ensure even flame distribution
  • • Clean any debris from burner ports
  • • Verify pilot lights are lit
Safety Checks
  • • Test safety shut-off valves
  • • Check gas connections for leaks
  • • Inspect door gaskets and hinges
  • • Verify thermostat accuracy

⚠️ Troubleshooting

Yellow Flame
  • • Clean pilot orifices
  • • Check air shutter adjustment
  • • Verify gas pressure
  • • Clean burner ports
Uneven Heating
  • • Check burner alignment
  • • Clean burner ports
  • • Verify gas flow
  • • Check for obstructions
